articles.title: "He Knows That...": Sunil Gavaskar's Brutal Verdict On Virat Kohli After Dismissal In 2nd ODI vs Aus.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Australia: Sunil Gavaskar was unhappy over the fact that Virat Kohli was dismissed in a similar manner in first and second ODIs against Australia.
articles.content: Virat Kohli on Sunday once again became a victim of LBW dismissal. The batter was dismissed for 31 runs on the bowling of Nathan Ellis as he missed his flick down the leg side in the second ODI again… [+1485 chars]

articles.description: India vs Australia Live Cricket Score 2nd ODI Match Today: After defeating the vistors in the first match in Mumbai, India would look to take an unassailable 2-0 lead in the series. As per the weather forecast, Visakhapatnam weather may play spoilsport
articles.content: India vs Australia: After a 2-1 win in the Border-Gavasakar Trophy in Tests, Rohit Sharma's team India are 1-0 up in the three-match ODI series which began at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium. The game in w… [+1183 chars]

articles.title: 43-year-old Rohan Bopanna becomes oldest Indian Wells champion - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Tennis News: India's Rohan Bopanna became the oldest ATP Masters 1000 champion when he and his Australian partner Matt Ebden claimed the men's doubles crown at the
articles.content:
What a match. What a reaction.Congratulations to our men's doubles champs @mattebden and @rohanbopanna! https://t.co/4ewG92fupj
